posts.post_content: Well folks it is really something not having all of the 100 + Ty Cobbs card that I once had..so I am looking for 1 Red Cobb in a nice 4-5 in cash trade can be a lesser grade if it looks good . I have alot of really nice shaped 4's and 5's lesser HOf's T206's and some oddball cards and some high end 69 and 71's topps in 8's and 9s with cash. The trade cash etc can favor you gimme a shout !!!
